mapper.select: SELECT Recipe.recipe_name, recipe.recipe_image, Recipe.recipe_id FROM Recipe_Favorites JOIN Recipe ON Recipe_Favorites.recipe_id = Recipe.recipe_id WHERE Recipe_Favorites.user_id = #{userId};
SELECT Recipe.recipe_name, Recipe.recipe_image, Recipe.recipe_description, Recipe.create_time, Recipe.recipe_experience FROM Recipe WHERE Recipe_id = #{recipe_id};
